body.bibl: Wagner, Jörg. “Provincia Osrhoenae: New Archaeological Finds Illustrating the Military Organisation under the Severan Dynasty.” In Armies and Frontiers in Roman and Byzantine Anatolia: Proceedings of a Colloquium Held at University College, Swansea, in April 1981, edited by Stephen Mitchell, 103–29.
